data.description:
You are the director, customize the stage and dancers and film a video wherever you want: in your living room, in your favorite part of the city, in a park or make them small enough to fit on your desk! The hand tracking allows you dance and interact with the dancers and the buttons freely.

Please note, the App Lab version is only for Quest 3 and Quest Pro and it has been optimized to be accepted on the store so some original features are not available. If you want the original version, you need to download it from Itch.io, that version can also be used with Quest 2.
There you can also find MODs and other games:
 https://ultra-fun-games.itch.io/


Features of MR PRIVATE DANCERS SANDBOX include:

Lifelike Dancers: Choose from a range of realistic dancers with distinct styles.

Interactive Play: Scale, move, and physically interact with dancers in your space.

Music and Choreography: An extensive music library for custom performances. We have songs of different genres: Tech House, Hip Hop, Phonk, Salsa, Arabic Bellydance

Advanced Handtracking: Realistic touch interaction for a deeper immersive experience.

Playful Elements: Use grenades of confetti, floating stars, and fireworks for added fun.

Stage Customization: Design the stage with adjustable lighting and effects.

Mixed Reality Experience: Seamlessly blend virtual content into your real-world environment.

Creative Freedom: Choreograph, design, and direct your unique dance show.

NEW SONGS AND MODELS COMING SOON
